Relocation my be provided for the right applicant. Responsibilities Provide Electrical and Instrumentation maintenance, calibration and repairs to plant equipment to include turbines, boilers systems, MCC, fuel gas compressors, water treatment systems, gas chromatograph, transformers, switchgear, various quality control systems and other related aux equipment. Read single lines, ladder logic and wiring diagrams. Responsible for maintaining logs, manuals, records, and operating procedures. Qualifications Additional professional training or associate degree preferred with a min of 3 yrs background in I&E system applications. We are in need of dependable shoppers that can help conduct mystery shops at a local bookstore in the area. The shop pay is $18 per shop, and you'll be asked to evaluate the customer service you receive in the store and purchase a small gift/supply item to obtain a receipt.. Register at telereachjobs.com to receive conference login instructions. Job summary: Outbound business-to-business sales appointment setters. All positions, FT or PT, are telecommute and daytime hours. Pay Info: TeleReach offers performance-based pay. Top FT callers earn $60+K/year. We are not hiring in the following states: AK, CA, CT, FL, HI, IL, MA, MD, MI, MT, ND, NH, NV, PA, or WA. Must have a min of 1yr verifiable B2B cold-calling background. Also required is high-speed Internet, land line with unlimited long distance, knowledge of Internet, Ms word and Microsoft excel. Please apply on our website : TeleReach.com, or call (713) 866-XXXX and leave a Verbal Resume. Under Referred By, please click on the website where you found our ad. We receive a large number of applications each week and unfortunately can not respond to every candidate.. Pizza Hut Server Job Jobs · Pizza Hut · Snyder, TX Job | Server Details Being a server at Pizza Hut® is about making hungry people happy – with tips! It’s about being independent and having fun, making new friends and earning extra cash. As a Pizza Hut server, you’re the smiling face that greets and serves our customers. Working with us will give you the financial rewards and flexibility to suit your lifestyle! You’ll learn new things, get recognized for your efforts and learn skills that last a lifetime. What are we looking for? The good news is that your training will teach you everything you need to know to succeed on the job. But there are a few skills you should have from the get-go: * You’re a fun and friendly person who values customers and takes absolute pride in everything you do. You know who you are --honest, energetic and fun. You’re never short of a smile and take real pride in your work; cope well under pressure and thrive on a challenge. * You’ve got attitude - the right kind of course - and understand the need to be on time, all the time.. See more Server Jobs in Snyder Being a server at Pizza Hut® is about making hungry people happy – with tips! It’s about being independent and having fun, making new fri... Tools X Tools Pizza Hut Server Job Respond Stop Fraud Report Learn More Marketplace User · 2 weeks ago on Jobs2Web Pizza Hut Delivery Driver Job Transportation · Pizza Hut · Snyder, TX Warehouse&Transportation | Delivery Driver Details Buckle up, hit the open road and start making hungry people happy as a delivery driver for Pizza Hut®. That’s right, we’ll pay you to cruise around in your mobile office – your car – listening to your own tunes and delivering great pizza – and pasta. What more could you want? Independence, good music and great food – with tips! Sound good? Besides your smile, energy and reliable set of wheels, here’s what you’ll need for this job: Job skills/qualifications: The good news is that your training will teach you everything you need to know to succeed on the job. But here are a few skills you should have from the get-go, as well as some qualifications: * A clean driving history: If you’re on a 1st name basis with the people at traffic court, this probably isn’t the right job for you. Safety is our priority. You’ll also need a valid driver’s license, insurance and reliable vehicle. * Friendly demeanor: Smile, tell a joke – treat our customers like you would your family and friends..
